issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: HttpServer2 should switch to using the non-blocking SslSelectChannelConnector to prevent performance degradation when handling SSL connections

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: After HADOOP-12765 is committed to branch-2, the handling of SSL connection by HttpServer2 may suffer the same Jetty bug described in HADOOP-10588. We should consider adding the same workaround for SSL connection.
fields.summary: Add jetty6 acceptor startup issue workaround to branch-2

comments.body:
Have patch available for this issue.
However, I don't seem to be able to upload the patch.
Thanks Min for taking on this work. Please try again.

+1 Will commit by end of week unless there are other comments. Thanks
Committed it to branch-2 and branch-2.8. Thanks [~mshen] for contributing the patch and thanks [~zhz] for the comment!
I think, we should backport to branch-2.7 also..?
Thanks for the reminder. I cherry picked it to 2.7.x
